sentence.idiomatic: Opportunities are given to people who have an eye for them.
He gave up such a great girlfriend, everyone says he has no taste.
Up until now she still hasn't found a boyfriend, it's all because her tastes are too high.
Who is that handsome man?
He is the most handsome man that I have ever seen.
Her boyfriend is quite handsome.
This time you can finally show off your own talent.
I've always tend to admire talented people.
She has displayed all her talents during this performance.
Man should get along harmoniously with nature.
To get along well with people, sincerity is very important.
He is a difficult person to get along with.
The articles he writes are the same old stuff with no new ideas.
How come your teaching method is always the same old thing?
What way can he come up with? Isn't it just the same old thing?
If you don't know then don't talk nonsense.
You can't gossip about what I've said.
You're talking nonsense. I have never done this before.
He found a good job, which made everyone completely envious.
They are really happy. I admire them so much.
Her career accomplishments make people admire her to no end.
Wow, Chen Jing, you are getting prettier and prettier! You’re not seeing someone, are you?
Feifei, you’re always talking nonsense! Hey, how is your new job?
The same old thing. But I actually get along with my new co-workers pretty well.
Oh, it looks like you must be interested in someone! Oh right, which company are you at now?
You can see for yourself on my business card.
No way! What a coincidence! It’s the same company as Lili’s boyfriend. Do you know Zhang Liang?
Huh? Zhang Liang? You’re saying Zhang Liang and Lili are a couple? This is such a coincidence! (sigh) Nowadays all the good men have been taken.
Good men? What do you think is good about him?
He’s a good person, talented and pretty good looking. Overall, in every aspect he’s pretty good. Lili has a really good taste.
What? Are you envious? You seem quite interested in him. Would you want to ask him out for a meal, or to go out for a drink?
How could I do that? Isn’t he your best friend’s boyfriend?
What’s wrong with that? It’s not like they’re married. Besides, Lili and Zhang Liang might not work out in the end anyways.

word.literal: turn in the course of events
